item.title: A guide to GraphQL in Java
item.description: GraphQL, MongoDB and Java: An introduction TLDR; Follow the guide below if you are interested in an up to date walkthrough on how to integrate GraphQL, MongoDB and Java - if not head over to my GitHub to view the code. I decided to create this article as although a lot of guides exist today they were either incomplete, irrelevant or out-dated. After struggling to decipher existing tutorials I thought I would contribute my findings back in hope someone would find them useful…
